org.xbib.logging.log4j2

Class ElasticsearchProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.logging.log4j2.ElasticsearchProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.logging.log4j.nosql.appender.NoSqlProvider<ElasticsearchConnection>

    @Plugin(name="Elasticsearch",
        category="Core",
        printObject=true)
public class ElasticsearchProvider
extends Object
implements org.apache.logging.log4j.nosql.appender.NoSqlProvider<ElasticsearchConnection>

      • createNoSqlProvider

        @PluginFactory
public static ElasticsearchProvider createNoSqlProvider(@PluginAttribute(value="cluster")
                                                      String cluster,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="host")
                                                      String host,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="port")
                                                      Integer port,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="index")
                                                      String index,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="type")
                                                      String type,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="sniff")
                                                      Boolean sniff,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="timeout")
                                                      String timeout,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="maxActionsPerBulkRequest")
                                                      Integer maxActionsPerBulkRequest,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="maxConcurrentBulkRequests")
                                                      Integer maxConcurrentBulkRequests,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="maxVolumePerBulkRequest")
                                                      String maxVolumePerBulkRequest,
                                                      @PluginAttribute(value="flushInterval")
                                                      String flushInterval)
        Factory method for creating an Elasticsearch provider within the plugin manager.
        Parameters:
        cluster - The name of the Elasticsearch cluster to which log event documents will be written.
        host - The host name an Elasticsearch server node of the cluster, defaults to localhost.
        port - The port that Elasticsearch is listening on, defaults to 9300
        index - The index that Elasticsearch shall use for indexing
        type - The type of the index Elasticsearch shall use for indexing
        Returns:
        a new Elasticsearch provider
